descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img594/8176/banner2pv.jpg[/img]

[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Ter[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]s:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]You may freely re-upload this mod.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=fuchsia]I[/color][color=silver]ntroduction: [/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Pinup Poser EX 1-3 reference guide. Quite self-explanatory.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Require[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]ents: [/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]A working internet browser, sanity, and fish tacos.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Installat[/color][color=fuchsia]i[/color][color=silver]on:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=transparent]11[/color][FONT=impact][size=5][color=silver]NMM:[/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Only on Thursdays.[/size][/font][/color]

[color=transparent]11[/color][color=silver][FONT=impact][size=5]Manual:[/size][/font][/color]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Download, unpack, feed \"index.html\" to portable web generator of your choice.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Lo[/color][color=fuchsia]c[/color][color=silver]ation:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]A dark, warm, and slightly damp place.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Uninstallation[/color][color=fuchsia]:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Feed to hungry bin.[/font][/size][/color]



=======

[font=impact][size=4][color=silver]Credits:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=3]Squirrels[/size][/font][/color]
author: Elewin
